hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: It is better that one of you should sit on the live coals which burns his clothing and come in contact with his skin than that he should sit on a grave

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْقُعُودِ عَلَى الْقَبْرِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Sit On Graves
